Imports

types, util

Vars

imageMatcher = @[(typeJpeg, isJpeg), (typePng, isPng), (typeBmp, isBmp),
                 (typeJxr, isJxr), (typePsd, isPsd), (typeIco, isIco),
                 (typeDwg, isDwg), (typeGif, isGif)]

Consts

typeJpeg = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "jpeg", value: "image/jpeg"),
            extension: "jpg")
typeJpeg2000 = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "jp2", value: "image/jp2"),
                extension: "jp2")
typePng = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "png", value: "image/png"),
           extension: "png")
typeGif = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "gif", value: "image/gif"),
           extension: "gif")
typeWebp = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "webp", value: "image/webp"),
            extension: "webp")
typeCr2 = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "x-canon-cr2",
                  value: "image/x-canon-cr2"), extension: "cr2")
typeTiff = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "tiff", value: "image/tiff"),
            extension: "tif")
typeBmp = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "bmp", value: "image/bmp"),
           extension: "bmp")
typeJxr = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "vnd.ms-photo",
                  value: "image/vnd.ms-photo"), extension: "jxr")
typePsd = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "vnd.adobe.photoshop",
                  value: "image/vnd.adobe.photoshop"), extension: "psd")
typeIco = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "vnd.microsoft.icon",
                  value: "image/vnd.microsoft.icon"), extension: "ico")
typeHeif = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "heif", value: "image/heif"),
            extension: "heif")
typeDwg = (mime: (typ: "image", subType: "vnd.dwg", value: "image/vnd.dwg"),
           extension: "dwg")

Funcs

func isJpeg(buf: openArray[byte]): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns buf matches Jpeg image format magic number.

Returns buf matches Png image format magic number.

Returns buf matches Bmp image format magic number.

Returns buf matches Jxr image format magic number.

Returns buf matches Psd image format magic number.
